text: Giancarlo Giorgetti (born 16 December 1966) is an Italian politician and member of the League. In 2022, he became the Minister of Economy and Finance in the Giorgia Meloni government. Giorgetti was the Minister of Economic Development in the government of Mario Draghi from 2021 to 2022. He was Secretary of the Council of Ministers from June 2018 until September 2019, in the government of Giuseppe Conte. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Lombardy
title: Giancarlo Giorgetti
